resources.string: Choose the number that is larger. \ nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points

"Congratulations, level passed! \n Did you know that the number 7 is the luckiest number. There are 7 days a week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes, 7 days of Creation and much more. Also the number 7 is most often the favorite number of people all over the world. "
Select the larger Roman numeral. \ nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points
"Congratulations, level passed! \n Did you know that there is no zero in Roman numerals?
Which animal shows the tongue more? \ nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points
"Congratulations, level passed! \n Do you know? That a woodpecker, when it strikes a tree with its beak, draws in its tongue and wraps it around its brain to protect it
Choose something edible. \ nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points
"Congratulations, level passed! \n Many crocodiles are known to swallow stones. But not because they are edible to them. Stones help them sink into the water faster and stay at the bottom.
